title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Competencies: Blended Learning (B-Learning)-Based Science Field Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level theoretical and experimental knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners improve practical skills in analyzing and interpreting scientific experiment data in blended learning environments
Learners acquire in-depth science knowledge (2+ out of 3 modules) aligned with personal learning goals through modular self-directed learning
Learners complete 80%+ of knowledge-sharing and problem-solving processes with peer practitioners using online collaboration tools (Zoom, LMS, etc.)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
